com.ca.mas.foundation

Class MASRequest.MASRequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ca.mas.foundation.MASRequest.MASRequestBuilder
  • Enclosing interface:
    MASRequest

    public static class MASRequest.MASRequestBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class to build MASRequest object

      • scope

        public MASRequest.MASRequestBuilder scope(java.lang.String scope)
        Sets the request grant scope; use a space delimiter for more than one scope, e.g. for READ WRITE.
        Parameters:
        scope - The scope.
        Returns:
        The builder

      • responseBody

        public MASRequest.MASRequestBuilder responseBody(MASResponseBody responseBody)
        Sets the type of parsed response. To specify the response, the SDK converts the correct data type for the response. The default response type is MASResponseBody.byteArrayBody().
        Parameters:
        responseBody - The response body.
        Returns:
        The builder

      • setPublic

        public MASRequest.MASRequestBuilder setPublic()
        The request is being made outside of primary gateway. When the public attribute is set, all automatically injected credentials in SDK will be excluded in the request.
        Returns:
        The builder

      • connectionListener

        public MASRequest.MASRequestBuilder connectionListener(MASConnectionListener listener)

        Register HttpURLConnection listener.

        The SDK uses Android HttpURLConnection to connect to the API; developers can intercept the connection with MASConnectionListener before a request is sent to the backend service.
        Parameters:
        listener - The connection listener
        Returns:
        The builder

      • notifyOnCancel

        public MASRequest.MASRequestBuilder notifyOnCancel()

      • sign

        public MASRequest.MASRequestBuilder sign()
        Signs the request with the device registered private key and injects JWT claims based on the user information. This method will use a default value of 5 minutes for the JWS 'exp' claim.
        Returns:
        The builder

      • sign

        public MASRequest.MASRequestBuilder sign(MASClaims claim)
        Signs the request with the device registered private key and injects JWT claims based on the user information. This method will use a default value of 5 minutes for the JWS 'exp' claim if not provided.
        Returns:
        The builder

      • sign

        public MASRequest.MASRequestBuilder sign(java.security.PrivateKey privateKey)
        Signs the request with the provided private key and injects JWT claims based on the user information.
        Returns:
        The builder

      • build

        public MASRequest build()
        Builds the MASRequest object.
        Returns:
        An immutable MASRequest object.
